posts.title: Introduction to React Hooks
posts.body: React Hooks allow you to use state and other React features without writing a class.

posts.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
posts.body: JavaScript closures are a fundamental concept that allows a function to access variables from an enclosing scope. Let's dive into how they work.

posts.title: How to Optimize Web Performance
posts.body: Improving web performance is crucial for user experience and SEO. Learn the best practices for optimizing load times and reducing latency.
